divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving back from a vacation in Big Bear, I look out the window andtheres something silver that reflects the late morning sun. I look closer and itwas a silver oval shaped ball right over the mountain ridge in the sky. Theresone fluffy cloud in the sky, not big enough to hide behind. I watched it, andtold my little brother, then it dissappeared in plain sight.
Summary: Silver mote that dissappeared in front of my eyes
trends: There have been no other sightings in Landers
This sighting has never been favorited.
